item.title: Minority
item.description: When I saw the headlines today, it made me feel very sad and disappointed. Switzerland voted yesterday. We have made it illegal to wear a Burka. There are now dress codes in our law. How weird? I never ever saw a women wearing one in Switzerland. So it’s not about preventing people covering their faces. It’s about discriminating a religion. It’s about stimulating fear of foreign cultures. Further we declined the launch of an electronic Identity Document.

item.title: My first post
item.description: Hi there. This is my first blog post. Actually, I’ve got no clue what to achieve and where to end up with this blog. I’m doing just for myself. Kind of a diary. To document where this journey called life leads me to. To be honest, I’m not even really sure about what the content is going to be about. I think I’m going to write down what ever keeps me busy.
